entities.description: The relationship between the victim and the offender, categorized into various types of relationships such as family members, friends, or others.
The unweighted frequency count of occurrences for each type of victim relationship.
The identification number of the offender in cases where the number of offenders is documented.
The total number of cases included in the survey data.
The minimum number of cases recorded for a particular variable or assessment.
The maximum number of cases recorded for a particular variable or assessment.

relationships.description: Defines the relationship of the victim to the offender, such as family members or other acquaintances.
Indicates the frequency count of each type of victim relationship without weighting adjustment.
Indicates the offender number in the documented cases.
Relates the survey to the total number of documented cases included in the dataset.
Specifies the minimum number of cases recorded for a specific variable or assessment in the survey.
Specifies the maximum number of cases recorded for a specific variable or assessment in the survey.
